structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Information concerning installations to be furnished air pollution control officer.
law.text: The air pollution control officer may, at any time, require from any person who operates any plant or uses any article, machine, equipment, or other contrivance specified by the regulations of the air pollution control board or this chapter, the use or operation of which may cause the issuance of an air contaminant, or may require from an applicant for, or holder of any permit provided for by the regulations of the air pollution control board, such information, analyses, plans or specifications as will disclose the nature, extent, quantity, or degree of air contaminants which are or may be discharged by such source.
law.history: Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1954. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 53.
